Formación

Universidad de Paris-Sorbonne​

Dr. en Planificación territorial, urbanismo y dinámicas del espacio

October 2013 – September 2014 (1 year)

Tokyo, Japan

BizReach is Japan’s top job site exclusive to business executives. I worked on front-end design and coding. My most recent project was Bizreach Woman, a job site specifically for female business executives in Japan.

Formación

Universidad de Toulouse Le Mirail

Master en investigación mención ciudades

March 2014 – April 2014 (2 months)

Tokyo, Japan

Schoo is Japan’s leading online learning platform. I designed and taught a bi-weekly class on HTML/CSS. On every lecture, I did live coding and there were ~500 live viewers.

Formación

Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile

Título profesional de Geógrafo

April 2012 – March 2013 (1 year)

Tokyo, Japan

After graduating from college, I worked as a sales associate at a B2B payments startup in Tokyo for 1 year. After that, I taught myself to code for ~6 months.
